pages.title: Noarhorn
pages.text: $(l)$(#990000)Health: 20$(#336600)$(br)Armor: 2$(#660066)$(br)Attack: 4$()$(br)Noarhorns are ground mobs from the Molten Hills biome. This mob is neutral towards the player and will run away when you hit them. From these mobs, you can get raw meat that can be cooked.

pages.title: Armored Noarhorn
pages.text: $(l)$(#990000)Health: 20$(#336600)$(br)Armor: 4$(#660066)$(br)Attack: 4$()$(br)Noarhorns with spikes will be hostile towards the player A feature of these mobs are incredibly strong spikes and growths on the back. They allow these creatures to partially return damage to the enemy that attacked them. From these mobs, you can get raw meat that can be cooked, and small fragments of their spikes.
Noarhorn Spikes can also be used to create a block that will deal damage to all entities nearby. And if there is lava in the immediate vicinity of the block, it will set fire to the victim.

pages.title: Cul. Mushroom on a Stick
pages.text: Noarhorns can be tamed with Culafite Mushroom and health boosted with Culafite Mushroom Stew. Tamed Noarhorn can be armed using Naorhorn Spikes. Spikeless Noarhorn can be saddled and controlled with a Culafite Mushroom on a Stick. Shake the bait to make Noarhorn $(t:RMB)$(o)attack the nearest target$() or $(t:Ctrl + RMB)$(o)temporarily speed up$(). This tool can also be found in the structures of the Molten Hills biome.
You can create a comfortable couch where tamed Narhorns will be waiting for you.$(br)It can also be used by players, or just be a nice decoration for your home as it can be dyed like beds
